title: nami's new skin :((((((((
body: i just see the namis new skin...euh wtf?! What is that?! it s like they take the main skin of nami and they give a walrus hats...i'm very disappoint omg he have so many possibility to create a beautiful nami skin! why  a  walrus ? i m very sad seriously i dont understand their choices? it s for the protection of walrus? ....

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=aihanaa,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0El0ANM0,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:28:29.117+0000)
>
> i just see the namis new skin...euh wtf?! What is that?! it s like they take the main skin of nami and they give a walrus hats...i'm very disappoint omg he have so many possibility to create a beautiful nami skin! why  a  walrus ? i m very sad seriously i dont understand their choices? it s for the protection of walrus? ....

First off, not a walrus.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Manatee

It's an Urf reference, which is very much a League of Legends thing.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Urf

She's dressed up like a manatee - Urf specifically! 

We've historically done manatee-themed skins for April Fools' Day in the past, such as Urf Rider Corki and Fisherman Fizz!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0El0ANM0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:33:55.947+0000)
>
> She's dressed up like a manatee - Urf specifically! 
> 
> We've historically done manatee-themed skins for April Fools' Day in the past, such as Urf Rider Corki and Fisherman Fizz!

**Can her tier be upgraded so we please get a giant URF surfing her tidal wave?**

I'd pay the couple extra bucks!
Not for this one. She does have manatees in her joke, though!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0El0ANM0,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:41:02.034+0000)
>
> Not for this one. She does have manatees in her joke, though!

Darn it! That's cool though :) the lil manatees are super adorb's.

Next time!

So long as Quinn's next skin is 1,350 RP or higher, I'll be good :)

**I'm firmly praying for Steel Legion or Transformer from this list:**

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=42252247

And praying against a silly, fun theme as her next one at this point.

**Any hints?!**

ok for april first... but it's long time to have a new nami skin and they come with that? its not a fish ...how long time to have a new cool skin after this skin joke?! sorry but i very dont like...:(
You must be fun at parties.

> [{quoted}](name=aihanaa,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0El0ANM0,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:34:42.270+0000)
>
> ok for april first... but it's long time to have a new nami skin and they come with that? its not a fish ...how long time to have a new cool skin after this skin joke?! sorry but i very dont like...:(

Nami's last skin was less than a year ago.  There are champions who have been waiting far longer.  Every April Fool's Day is going to have at least one joke skin, so Nami players are *lucky* that she was one of them.  You know what the other option was?  Not having a Nami skin.

i wait soooo long time to have river spirit nami... if i wait another one year bevause of  urf day... maybe you like it cool but i dont ... nami he my main ... i dont like this skin ...sorry  it s sure i dont purchase this skin! thats not the point i hope to dont understand more because of that skin...that sthe point when nami could have a changed color skin?!
i...i dont even know what grammar this is also you called nami a "he"

It's a cheap skin that only cost 750 RP. Besides, as Weasel said, it's only been less than a year since River Spirit. The fact she got another skin this short amount of time compared to other champions, it's literally a blessing.

> [{quoted}](name=aihanaa,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0El0ANM0,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:44:01.346+0000)
>
> i wait soooo long time to have river spirit nami... if i wait another one year bevause of  urf day... maybe you like it cool but i dont ... nami he my main ... i dont like this skin ...sorry  it s sure i dont purchase this skin! thats not the point i hope to dont understand more because of that skin...that sthe point when nami could have a changed color skin?!
Rivre spirit and koi nami are both really good. Imagine how Zac and Zed players must feel

If you know the history of LoL, you should know the skin is based on the Lord Almighty Manatee, Urf.

Besides, it's an April Fool's Skin, a collection of joke skins that's meant to be fun and hilarious.
ok for april skin.... but after? i really like fizz with he little yellow suit but nami..., she s look like first skin... just with a hat... :(

> [{quoted}](name=aihanaa,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0El0ANM0,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-03-13T17:36:55.389+0000)
>

And a manatee tail.  And thematic sleeves.  And an Urf spatula.  And manatee pets for her /joke.
its also the cheapest tier skin for a good laugh, if it was any higher i would call BS, but it does what it manages to say. Don't buy it if you don't like it, simple as that
It's a fcking april fool's skin. It's designed to be an april fool themed skin.
